mapper.select: select info_id, info_title, (select para_value from T_APP_PARAMETER_DETAIL where para_id = 'INFO_TYPE' and para_code = t.info_type) as info_type, info_content, info_url, to_char(create_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as info_date from t_app_myinfo t where t.is_open = '0' order by create_time desc
